Demoralize.description: A shout that terrifies and damages enemies

Sprint.description: Increases movement speed and can be modified for offensive capabilities

Ground Stomp.description: A powerful ground-based attack that can stun enemies

Whirlwind.description: A spinning attack that deals continuous damage to nearby enemies

Iron Skin.description: A defensive ability that increases armor and can provide additional effects

Leap.description: A mobility skill that can be enhanced for offensive capabilities

War Cry.description: A buff that enhances the Barbarian and nearby allies

Wrath of the Berserker.description: Ultimate ability that greatly enhances combat capabilities

Undying Rage.description: A powerful defensive cooldown that prevents death

Cleave.description: A sweeping attack that hits multiple enemies

Frenzy.description: Builds up attack speed with consecutive hits

Hammer of the Ancients.description: A powerful hammer strike that deals heavy damage

Furious Charge.description: A charging attack that deals damage to enemies in its path

Chained Spear.description: A spear attack that damages and pulls in enemies
